item.description:
Join Therapeutic Breathwork Practitioner, Tara Nieves, and I in breathing, meditation, movement and more in the presence of other divine beings in a safe and sacred space.

 

Beginners are always welcome. Meet new friends and leave feeling peaceful, open, and joyful! Discover how to truly experience new levels of pleasure in your life.

 

This ANCIENT and REVOLUTIONARY work will teach you powerful tools that will allow you access to your own BLISS and JOY!!

 

DETAILS:

* We are meeting at The Watertown Center, 22 Mt. Auburn Street, Watertown, MA (there's plenty of parking on the street and in the back lot!)

* Please arrive at 5:45 pm as we will start right at 6 pm.

* Sacred ritual will end at 8 pm.

* Please wear comfortable clothing and something colorful and celebratory.

* Please let your friends know and bring them along!

 

Please note that this Tantra Gathering is being advertised to Tara's fans as well and could indeed fill up the space. If you are excited, ready and your calendar is clear, I suggest you RSVP right away to hold your spot. If we need to (and it's possible), we'll move into a larger space in the same building.

 

To confirm your space, please pay in advance. Using PayPal, you can send your payment to my email address: pushana@gmail.com.
item.name: Tantra Gathering~ Awaken your Breath, Deepen your Connection
